information that you provide to us via the website sightseeing buddy reserves the right to update this privacy policy at any time to reflect any changes to its services or procedures via amending the privacy policy on the website effective as soon as the updated privacy policy is posted on the website if any material changes occur sightseeing buddy will notify users via email international transfer sightseeing buddy is based in south africa by using the website you are agree that your information can be transferred and maintained in south africa the information you provide to sightseeing buddy may be transferred to and maintained on computers and servers that are locate outside your country of residence and thus the privacy laws applicable may differ from or be less protective than those in your country of residence personal information the information sightseeing buddy collects on the website from users is primarily used to provide users with access to the services provided by sightseeing buddy it may also be used to improve the services users can access the website without having to submit personal information however once users become registered they lose their anonymity when users register to book experiences contact sightseeing buddy or register as locals to host experiences users are requested to submit personal information to identify and contact you sightseeing buddy collects collates processes and uses the following types of information about you when you use or access the website information provided by the user sightseeing buddy collects personal information that is information about the user that is personally identifiable like the user s name address age gender e mail address phone number s and other unique information such as user ids and passwords billing and transaction information product and service preferences and contact preferences that are not otherwise publicly available sightseeing buddy verifies the user s name and email address when the user completes the registration process and information that is collected automatically sightseeing buddy receives and stores information which is transmitted automatically from the user s computer when the user browses the internet this information includes information from cookies the user s internet protocol ip address browser type web beacons embedded web links and other commonly used information gathering tools these tools collect certain standard information that your browser sends to sightseeing buddy such as your browser type and language access times and the address from which you arrived at sightseeing buddy your ip address is the unique address of your computer or device which is automatically provided to other computers when your web browser or email application requests a web page or email from those computers on the internet use and disclosure of information sightseeing buddy will use your personal information to enable you to access and use the website such as communicating with other users through the messaging service and booking process sightseeing buddy may display the personal information contained in your profile to users who have connected with you via the website sightseeing buddy may use your personal information to operate protect improve and optimize the website better the user experience perform analytics conduct research and provide customer service sightseeing buddy will use your email address to contact you from time to time and may also use it for security reasons to confirm your identity sightseeing buddy agrees not to use your provided electronic mail address in any manner that you do not consent to nor alert any other parties of your address without your consent sightseeing buddy may also on occasion provide personal information to trusted entities and third parties for the purpose of providing you with information on goods or services we believe will be of interest to you you have the right to opt out of receiving electronic mail communication by following the directions posted on every electronic mail communication sightseeing buddy may review scan or analyze your communications with other users exchanged on the website to ensure compliance with the website s terms and conditions sightseeing buddy may use the information collected automatically such as the user s ip address and information stored via cookies to gather statistics about the number of people who visit the website and to customise the website s content layout and services advertisements may be delivered to you by sightseeing buddy s advertising partners sightseeing buddy may transfer information about your use of the website such as your ip address and information stored via cookies to its advertising partners and other third parties this information may be used to provide advertising promotions and other products and services that may be of particular interest to you sightseeing buddy s advertising partners may set and access cookies or use other technologies such as web beacons which are electronic files that allow a web site to count users who have visited that page or to access certain cookies in order to personalise advertising content use by these advertising partners of their own cookies and any other tracking technologies are subject to their privacy policies sightseeing buddy uses its reasonable efforts to ensure that its advertising partners are operating privacy policies that are in accordance with its own privacy standards as set out in herein sightseeing buddy s advertising and promotions partners have no access to your name or personal contact information stored by sightseeing buddy unless you choose to share it with them sightseeing buddy will not provide your name or personal contact information to an advertising partner when you interact with or view a targeted advertisement sightseeing buddy may provide your personally identifiable information and the data generated by cookies and the aggregate information to the vendors service providers and service agencies that sightseeing buddy may engage to assist it in providing its products and services to you such vendors and service agencies will be obligated to use your personally identifiable information solely to provide the products to the sightseeing buddy sightseeing buddy will disclose the user s personally identifiable information if it reasonably believes that it is required to do so by law regulation or other government authority or to protect the rights and property of sightseeing buddy its affiliates or the public sightseeing buddy may also co operate with law enforcement in any official investigation and may disclose the user s personally identifiable information to the relevant agency or authority in doing so sightseeing buddy reserves the right to transfer your personal information in the event of a transfer of ownership such as acquisition by or merger with another entity if any acquiring entity should plan to materially change the sightseeing buddy s terms and conditions sightseeing buddy will notify you beforehand circumstances may arise where whether for strategic or other business reasons sightseeing buddy decides to sell buy merge or otherwise reorganize its business such a transaction may involve the disclosure of personal information to prospective or actual purchasers or the receipt of it from sellers it is the sightseeing buddy s practice to seek reasonable protection for information in these types of transactions from time to time sightseeing buddy may share aggregated information with third parties for strategic purposes any information shared in these contexts will not contain your personal information sightseeing buddy may employ third party companies and individuals to help improve or facilitate its service to provide the service on its behalf and perform website related services these third parties may have access to your personal information if they do your information is still protected by the terms of our privacy policy this access is only granted to third parties so that they may perform these tasks on sightseeing buddy s behalf and they are obligated not to disclose your information or use it for any other purpose sightseeing buddy keeps track of the number of users of the website and duration of use to help maintain accurate timely complete and relevant information for sightseeing buddy s business purposes access to and accuracy of your information sightseeing buddy strives to keep your personal information accurately recorded sightseeing buddy provides a user with the reasonable ability to review and correct it or ask for anonymization blockage or deletion as applicable you are entitled to request access to any relevant personal data held by sightseeing buddy as laid out in the promotion of access to information act 2 of 2000 and where such access is necessary for you to exercise and or protect any of your rights in accordance with the protection of personal information act 4 of 2013 you may request sightseeing buddy to review the personal information which it holds and may request for sightseeing buddy to delete such information if you would like sightseeing buddy to cancel your account please contact sightseeing buddy which will attempt to accommodate your request if it does not have any legal obligation or a legitimate business reason to retain the information contained in your account in the event that you cancel your sightseeing buddy account any reviews you have posted will remain publicly viewable all the provisions outlined in this privacy policy are subject to sightseeing buddy ensuring and sightseeing buddy hereby undertakes to ensure that its use of any personal information provided by you will always comply with the provisions of popi and any other applicable laws in south africa cookies cookies are a common internet technology and are files that are written or downloaded to your computer or mobile device s hard drive when you access or use an application they may allow sightseeing buddy to store and quickly retrieve login information and provide data that sightseeing buddy can use to improve the quality of its service certain internet browsers may be initially set up to accept cookies if you prefer you may set the device to refuse cookies although you may not be able to take full advantage of sightseeing buddy and lose some of the features and functionality of the online platforms sightseeing buddy may link information stored in cookies such as your age gender and country with your personally identifiable information and it may use such information to gather statistics about the number of people who visit the website and to customize the website s content customer support layout and services for delivery to the user sightseeing buddy account the website can be used to facilitate the advertising and booking of experiences listings for such experiences are made available via the website by a local listings of experiences ratings and reviews of locals and users and profile information are visible to any sightseeing buddy user whether registered or not by creating a sightseeing buddy account you are agreeing to allow sightseeing buddy to set up a sightseeing buddy account including your first name and last name you can select the other items of personal information that you wish to be included in your profile page including but not limited to a profile picture a personal profile and links to services you are offering the website will display your profile information on your sightseeing buddy profile page publicly via the website and with your prior permission on third party sites any information you choose to provide as part of your profile information will be publicly visible to all sightseeing buddy users whether registered or not and consequently you must decide how much information you wish to share information needed from users and locals if you post an experience sightseeing buddy may publish that experience publicly via the website and may enable third parties to publish your experience on their websites through the use of an html widget sightseeing buddy may also display the general geographical location of your experience in the form of a map so that potential users can see the general area and location of the experience if you choose to book an experience via the website sightseeing buddy will share the following information about you with the applicable local your first and last name and a link to your sightseeing buddy profile page this information will enable the local to decide whether to confirm or reject the booking when a local confirms a booking sightseeing buddy will share some of the local s identify information with the user via email including but not limited to first and last name phone number the address where the experience takes place and the local s email address with the applicable user selected by the local sightseeing buddy will share some of the user s identify information with the local including but not limited to first and last name phone number and email address so that the user and the local may contact one another directly under no circumstance is a user s billing information ever shared with a local security sightseeing buddy takes several precautions to safeguard information against loss misuse and theft of information when you enter sensitive information such as credit card number or paypal address on sightseeing buddy forms sightseeing buddy encrypts that information using secure socket layer technology ssl which keeps your information safe while it is transferred over the internet however no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure therefore there is no guarantee its absolute security in the event of any breach of security sightseeing buddy will make any legally required disclosures concerning the breach and the confidentiality or integrity of your unencrypted electronically stored personal data to you via email or via a posting on the website without unreasonable delay in as far as it is consistent with any legitimate needs of law enforcement and any measures required to determine the scope of the breach and to is a natural world heritage site but also one of the new7wonder of nature selected in 2011 to honour this wonder the city of cape town decided to place yellow frames at 7 different locations to look --
-- Table structure for table `craft_sections`
--

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `craft_sections`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `craft_sections` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `structureId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `handle` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('single','channel','structure') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'channel',
  `hasUrls` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `template` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `enableVersioning` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateCreated` datetime NOT NULL,
  `dateUpdated` datetime NOT NULL,
  `uid` char(36) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `craft_sections_name_unq_idx` (`name`),
  UNIQUE KEY `craft_sections_handle_unq_idx` (`handle`),
  KEY `craft_sections_structureId_fk` (`structureId`),
  CONSTRAINT `craft_sections_structureId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`structureId`) REFERENCES `craft_structures` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=15 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;

  `urlFormat` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci,
  `nestedUrlFormat` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci,

  `dateUpdated` datetime NOT NULL,

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `structureId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `elementId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `root` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `lft` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `rgt` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `level` smallint(6) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `dateCreated` datetime NOT NULL,
  `dateUpdated` datetime NOT NULL,
  `uid` char(36) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

  KEY `craft_structureelements_lft_idx` (`lft`),
  KEY `craft_structureelements_rgt_idx` (`rgt`),

  KEY `craft_structureelements_elementId_fk` (`elementId`),
  CONSTRAINT `craft_structureelements_elementId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`elementId`) REFERENCES `craft_elements` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,

  `uid` char(36) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `craft_usergroups_users_groupId_userId_unq_idx` (`groupId`,`userId`),
  KEY `craft_usergroups_users_userId_fk` (`userId`),
  CONSTRAINT `craft_usergroups_users_groupId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`groupId`) REFERENCES `craft_usergroups` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `craft_usergroups_users_userId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `craft_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

--
-- Table structure for table `craft_users`
--

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `craft_users`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `craft_users` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `username` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `photo` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `firstName` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastName` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `password` char(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `preferredLocale` char(12) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `weekStartDay` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `admin` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `client` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `locked` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `suspended` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pending` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `archived` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `lastLoginDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastLoginAttemptIPAddress` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `invalidLoginWindowStart` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `invalidLoginCount` tinyint(4) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastInvalidLoginDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `lockoutDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `verificationCode` char(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `verificationCodeIssuedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `unverifiedEmail` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `passwordResetRequired` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `lastPasswordChangeDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `dateCreated` datetime NOT NULL,
  `dateUpdated` datetime NOT NULL,
  `uid` char(36) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `craft_users_username_unq_idx` (`username`),
  UNIQUE KEY `craft_users_email_unq_idx` (`email`),
  KEY `craft_users_verificationCode_idx` (`verificationCode`),
  KEY `craft_users_uid_idx` (`uid`),
  KEY `craft_users_preferredLocale_fk` (`preferredLocale`),
  CONSTRAINT `craft_users_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `craft_elements` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `craft_users_preferredLocale_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`preferredLocale`) REFERENCES `craft_locales` (`locale`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;

--
-- Table structure for table `local_bookings`
--

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `local_bookings`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `local_bookings` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `reference` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `experience_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `pricing_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `schedule_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `amount` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `local_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `time` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `message` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci,
  `special_requests` mediumtext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `date` date DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','processed','cancelled','failed') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `bookings_user_id_foreign` (`user_id`),
  KEY `bookings_experience_id_foreign` (`experience_id`),
  KEY `bookings_pricing_id_foreign` (`pricing_id`),
  KEY `bookings_schedule_id_foreign` (`schedule_id`),
  KEY `bookings_local_id_foreign` (`local_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `bookings_experience_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`experience_id`) REFERENCES `local_experiences` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `bookings_local_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`local_id`) REFERENCES `local_users` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `bookings_pricing_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`pricing_id`) REFERENCES `local_pricings` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `bookings_schedule_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`schedule_id`) REFERENCES `local_experience_schedules` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `bookings_user_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `local_users` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=52 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;

--
-- Table structure for table `local_cities`
--

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `local_cities`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `local_cities` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `country_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `cities_name_unique` (`name`),
  KEY `cities_country_id_foreign` (`country_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `cities_country_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`country_id`) REFERENCES `local_countries` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=18 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

-- Table structure for table `local_contacts`

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `local_contacts`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `local_contacts` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `mobile` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `telephone` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `contacts_user_id_foreign` (`user_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `contacts_user_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `local_users` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;

--
-- Table structure for table `local_experiences`
--

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `local_experiences`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `local_experiences` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `country_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `street_address` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `postal_code` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `category_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `sub_category_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `teaser` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `duration` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `units` enum('hours','days') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'hours',
  `extra_pickup` enum('Free of charge','Extra charges','Not included') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Free of charge',
  `extra_food` enum('Free of charge','Extra charges','Not included') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Free of charge',
  `extra_misc` enum('Free of charge','Extra charges','Not included') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Free of charge',
  `cover_image` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `slug` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `experiences_user_id_foreign` (`user_id`),
  KEY `experiences_country_id_foreign` (`country_id`),
  KEY `experiences_city_id_foreign` (`city_id`),
  KEY `experiences_category_id_foreign` (`category_id`),
  KEY `experiences_sub_category_id_foreign` (`sub_category_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `experiences_category_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`category_id`) REFERENCES `local_experience_categories` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `experiences_city_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`city_id`) REFERENCES `local_cities` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `experiences_country_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`country_id`) REFERENCES `local_countries` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `experiences_sub_category_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`sub_category_id`) REFERENCES `local_experience_categories` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `experiences_user_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `local_users` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `local_introductions`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;

CREATE TABLE `local_introductions` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `gender` enum('female','male') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `id_number` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `reason` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `image` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `introductions_user_id_foreign` (`user_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `introductions_user_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `local_users` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `local_locations` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `country_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `street_address` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `postal_code` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `locations_user_id_foreign` (`user_id`),
  KEY `locations_country_id_foreign` (`country_id`),
  KEY `locations_city_id_foreign` (`city_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `locations_city_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`city_id`) REFERENCES `local_cities` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `locations_country_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`country_id`) REFERENCES `local_countries` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `locations_user_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `local_users` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `local_subscribers` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `email` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `subscribers_email_unique` (`email`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=17 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;

--
-- Table structure for table `local_users`
--

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `local_users`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `local_users` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `first_name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `last_name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `username` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `password` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('local','guest') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'local',
  `remember_token` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `verify_token` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `is_verified` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `gender` enum('female','male') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `mobile` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `telephone` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `id_number` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `reason` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci,
  `image` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `country_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `users_email_unique` (`email`),
  UNIQUE KEY `users_username_unique` (`username`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=56 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;

--
-- Table structure for table `local_wallets`
--

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `local_wallets`;
/*!40101 SET @saved_cs_client     = @@character_set_client */;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = utf8 */;
CREATE TABLE `local_wallets` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `bank` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `branch` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `account_number` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `wallets_user_id_foreign` (`user_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `wallets_user_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `local_users` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
/*!40101 SET character_set_client = @saved_cs_client */;
